/usr/bin/c++   -pthread -fPIC -pedantic -g -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-switch -Wno-multichar -Wsequence-point -Wformat-security -mssse3 -std=c++11 -std=c++11 -pthread -O2 -g -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/rs-sensor-control.dir/rs-sensor-control.cpp.o  -o rs-sensor-control -Wl,-rpath,/root/librealsense: ../../librealsense2.so.2.13.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so -lm /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglfw.so -lusb-1.0
